title: Control & Monitor
text: NWRM enables real-time robot control and monitoring for optimal operational efficiency.

section.title: Scheduled Mission
section.content: Set up and automate routine tasks for consistent performance.

section.title: Mission Execution
section.content: Launch and manage missions with precision and oversight.

section.title: Live Streaming
section.content: Monitor robot activities live for quick situational assessments.

section.title: Records & Notification
section.content: Receive timely updates and access a complete mission history for accountability.
